response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted with the highest quality materials, ensuring both functionality and durability. Given its unique features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, we believe it is worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its value and the benefits it will bring to you, I kindly propose a special introductory offer of $10,000 for this product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, so we can discuss further details and ensure a smooth transaction. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
